pinyin: Ge1 lun2 bi3 ya4 Da4 xue2

definition: Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: which is different from other universities such as like Columbia University in New York.
sentences.chinese: 这和其他的学校不同，比如说纽约的哥伦比亚大学。

sentences.english: 1900-1907 attended Harvard University and Columbia University.
sentences.chinese: 1907年哈佛大学和哥伦比亚大学。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, Rothbard chose to attend Columbia University.
sentences.chinese: 同一时期，罗斯巴德选择了去上哥伦比亚大学。

sentences.english: He hopes to get tenure at Columbia University this year.
sentences.chinese: 他希望今年得到哥伦比亚大学的终身职。

sentences.english: He is assistant professor at the Columbia University Creative Writing Program in New York.
sentences.chinese: 他目前在纽约哥伦比亚大学写作系任助理教授。

sentences.english: I work in the bursar’s office at Columbia.
sentences.chinese: 我在哥伦比亚大学财务处上班。

sentences.english: Yong He , Mimi Gates , Ban Wang, Jianxia Liu in Columbia university.
sentences.chinese: 何勇，咪咪盖茨，汪班，刘剑霞在哥伦比亚大学。

sentences.english: Well, I might want to go to Columbia. But I might not.
sentences.chinese: 我可能想去读哥伦比亚大学，但也可能不想。

sentences.english: Brenner is head of the Center for Radiological Research at Columbia University.
sentences.chinese: 布伦纳是哥伦比亚大学放射学研究中心的主任。

sentences.english: He has served as a visiting professor of finance at the Columbia University Graduate School of Business in New York.
sentences.chinese: 他还担任了在纽约的哥伦比亚大学商学院的客座教授。

sentences.english: which is required of all second year Columbia University students.
sentences.chinese: 是哥伦比亚大学所有大二学生的必修课。

sentences.english: I work at the University of British Columbia.
sentences.chinese: 我在不列颠哥伦比亚大学工作。

sentences.english: She has also taught at Vassar College and Columbia University.
sentences.chinese: 并曾执教于瓦莎学院及哥伦比亚大学。

sentences.english: Now Columbia is going retail--on the Web.
sentences.chinese: 现在哥伦比亚大学正在通过互联网进行零售。

sentences.english: Then Gyllenhaal went to study eastern religions and philosophy in University of Columbia.
sentences.chinese: 吉伦哈尔于是就到哥伦比亚大学学习东方宗教和哲学。

sentences.english: Could you compare Columbia with the other Ivy League Universities?
sentences.chinese: 你能比较一下哥伦比亚大学跟其他的常春藤大学吗？

pinyin: Pu3 lin2 si1 dun4 Da4 xue2
Bin1 xi1 fa3 ni2 ya4 Da4 xue2

definition: University of California/abbr. for 加利福尼亞大學|加利福尼亚大学[Jia1 li4 fu2 ni2 ya4 Da4 xue2]

pinyin: Da2 te4 mao2 si1 Xue2 yuan4
